title: Hunting The Wolf
description: Ryker has no need for a pack, no need to live as a man…but he aches for his mate. Only Shiloh doesn’t know. He’s one of the pack and has never turned his intentions toward Ryker.Shiloh knows how to fight,defend, and protect Channing land. And he’s never been needed more. The ranchers are restless. Ryker is a solitary wolf, but he’s a good man to have his back. Alone together, on a dark and stormy night, passion overpowers duty. Will they discover more than the hunting of the wolves?
author: Taylor McKay
